alert.note: Alert for Bland; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bland and central Wythe Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Favonia, or near Wytheville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wytheville... Max Meadows... Crockett... Cripple Creek... Favonia... and Fort Chiswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
